items.name: The Poet's Pen
explicitMods: +1 to Level of Socketed Skill Gems per 25 Player Levels
Trigger a Socketed Spell when you Attack with this Weapon, with a 0.25 second Cooldown
Adds 3 to 5 Physical Damage to Attacks with this Weapon per 3 Player Levels
12% increased Attack Speed
flavourText: In every piece of prose, lies a tiny spark of magic.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Launches shards of ice in rapid succession. After travelling a short distance they change to a second form, which moves much faster and pierces through enemies.
explicitMods: Deals 622 to 933 Cold Damage
Fires an additional Projectile
40% increased Projectile Speed
Second form has 600% increased Critical Strike Chance
Second form has +50% to Critical Strike Multiplier
Second form has 300% more Projectile Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Shavronne's Wrappings
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Projectile Gems
explicitMods: 132% increased Energy Shield
10% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge
+32% to Lightning Resistance
Reflects 1 to 250 Lightning Damage to Melee Attackers
Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Energy Shield
flavourText: Shavronne's apparel became ever more extravagant
as her body and soul became ever more corrupted.

socketedItems.typeLine: Awakened Cast On Critical Strike Support
socketedItems.baseType: Awakened Cast On Critical Strike Support
socketedItems.secDescrText: Must support both an attack skill and a spell skill to work. The attack skill will trigger a spell when it critically strikes an enemy. Cannot support totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 7% less Spell Damage
Supported Attacks will Trigger a Supported Spell when you Crit an Enemy
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Supported Skills have 20% increased Attack Critical Strike Chance
Supported Spells have 25% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
Supported Skills have 20% increased Spell Critical Strike Chance
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires your wand to unleash projectiles that fire toward enemies in front of you or to your sides, dealing increased damage and granting you a power charge if an enemy is killed by, or soon after, the hit.
explicitMods: Fires 8 additional Projectiles
Culling Strike
20% chance to gain a Power Charge when Projectile Hits a Rare or Unique Enemy
20% increased Critical Strike Chance per Power Charge
+10% to Critical Strike Multiplier per Power Charge

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, making them more vulnerable to Critical Strikes. Killing the cursed enemy will grant life and mana, and a power charge. You can only have one Mark at a time.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have a 100% chance to grant a Power Charge when slain
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +1.5% to Critical Strike Chance
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +49% to Critical Strike Multiplier
Cursed enemies grant 600 Life when Killed
Cursed enemies grant 80 Mana when Killed
Cursed enemies take 4% increased Damage

explicitMods: +3 to Level of all Ice Spear Gems
+12% to all Elemental Resistances

We were warned that there would be consequences..."

Transfiguration of Body
Transfiguration of Mind
flavourText: Divinity is not the only path to enlightenment.
